DOC.brief_summary: This study second administration GSK1362885 human . GSK1362885 novel , potent inhibitor human glycogen phosphorylase ( GP ) development treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) . This study investigate compound 's safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics subject Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics GSK1362885 Type 2 Diabetics
